title: Digital Game-Based Critical Thinking Enhancement Program for Science Inquiry Processes at Scale

context.prior_knowledge: High School-Level Science Foundations and Comprehension of Biological Concepts
context.additional_context: A blended learning program combining digital game-based activities and offline discussion sessions to strengthen science job competencies in vocational training institutions.

learning_goals: Learners can demonstrate information interpretation skills with over 80% accuracy to solve science-related problems
Learners can apply analytical techniques when deriving scientific conclusions from animal lifecycle data analysis
Learners can make decisions based on logical conclusions in animal protection scenarios through game-based simulations
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
